text: @realDonaldTrump U know...if u spent just 1/2 ur time working on COVID19, u would have better polls BUT All U Can DO (everyday, ALL hrs) is Watch TV & TWEET! Pls grow UP!! Every1 is Finally seeing UR Temper tantrums 4 what they R...a spoiled kid not getting his way! GROW UP!!
